p: The active products of EOs can be encapsulated, used with polymer resins or synergized by other compound like vanillin [ 105, 128]. According to Tawatsin [ 129], oils from Curcuma longa, Cymbopogon winterianus and Ocimum americanum, especially with the addition of 5% vanillin, repelled Anopheles dirus under cage conditions for up to eight hours.
